title: Group portrait of eleven nurses, including Eunice Cook standing in center wearing light colored hat and light colored long sleeved dress, gathered behind table with Red Cross flag, in interior with brick walls, posters that read "Take a Red Cross Home Nursing Course Learn to Guard the Home First" and "Now More Than Even You Need A Home Nursing Course", and sign that reads "The Red Cross Services Home Nursing, Junior Red Cross, Nutrition Service First Aid", another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
